For those wondering...
The sound issue is they used a low Audio bit rate so it sounds a little watery but not that bad.
The Video is quite good actually!

Thanks scene!!!

Oh!
One More Thing.

If you have the k-lite codec pack installed and use the ffdshow audio decoder then use the re-sample function and set it to 48Khz highest quality it sounds close to perfect...

Just thought I'd throw that out there!
Peace!
